document_data.name: Jaerlethket
document_data.mainbody: '''Jaerlethket''' was a [[silver dragon]] [[paladin]] of [[Bahamut]] and a member of the [[Talons of Justice]].
document_data.Lair: Jaerlethket's lair was located somewhere in [[Damara]].
document_data.Activities: As of [[1374 DR]], Jaerlethket was one of the few known members of the Talons. He was also the advisor to King [[Gareth Dragonsbane]].
